mapper.sql: select ID, STOCK_IN_CODE, BPM_KEY, PROCESS_ID, WAREHOUSE_ID, IN_TYPE, IN_TIME, IN_PERSON_ID, IN_PERSON_NAME, CHECKER_ID, CHECKER_NAME, SUPPLIER_ID, INVOICE_NO, STATUS, DESCRIPTON, CREATE_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATOR, UPDATE_DATE FROM

#where() #set($_p = $_parameter.condition) #if($_p.id && $_p.id != '') #set($_id = $_p.id) AND ID LIKE @{_id} #end #if($_p.stockInCode && $_p.stockInCode != '') #set($_stockInCode = '%' + $_p.stockInCode + '%') AND STOCK_IN_CODE LIKE @{_stockInCode} #end #if($_p.bpmKey && $_p.bpmKey != '') #set($_bpmKey = '%' + $_p.bpmKey + '%') AND BPM_KEY LIKE @{_bpmKey} #end #if($_p.processId && $_p.processId != '') #set($_processId = $_p.processId) AND PROCESS_ID = @{_processId} #end #if($_p.warehouseId && $_p.warehouseId != '') #set($_warehouseId = $_p.warehouseId) AND WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_warehouseId} #end #if($_p.inType && $_p.inType != '') #set($_inType = $_p.inType) AND IN_TYPE = @{_inType} #end
#if($_p.inTime && $_p.inTime != '') #set($_inTime = $_p.inTime) AND IN_TIME = @{_inTime} #end #if($_p.startInTime && $_p.startInTime != '') #set($_startInTime = $_p.startInTime) AND IN_TIME >= @{_startInTime} #end #if($_p.endInTime && $_p.endInTime != '') #set($_endInTime = $_p.endInTime) AND IN_TIME <= @{_endInTime} #end #if($_p.inPersonId && $_p.inPersonId != '') #set($_inPersonId = $_p.inPersonId) AND IN_PERSON_ID = @{_inPersonId} #end
#if($_p.inPersonName && $_p.inPersonName != '') #set($_inPersonName = '%' + $_p.inPersonName + '%') AND IN_PERSON_NAME LIKE @{_inPersonName} #end #if($_p.checkerId && $_p.checkerId != '') #set($_checkerId = $_p.checkerId) AND CHECKER_ID = @{_checkerId} #end
#if($_p.checkerName && $_p.checkerName != '') #set($_checkerName = '%' + $_p.checkerName + '%') AND CHECKER_NAME LIKE @{_checkerName} #end
#if($_p.supplierId && $_p.supplierId != '') #set($_supplierId = $_p.supplierId) AND SUPPLIER_ID = @{_supplierId} #end
#if($_p.invoiceNo && $_p.invoiceNo != '') #set($_invoiceNo = '%' + $_p.invoiceNo + '%') AND INVOICE_NO LIKE @{_invoiceNo} #end #end

INSERT INTO ( #if($_databaseId == 'oracle') ID, #end STOCK_IN_CODE, BPM_KEY, PROCESS_ID, WAREHOUSE_ID, IN_TYPE, IN_TIME, IN_PERSON_ID, IN_PERSON_NAME, CHECKER_ID, CHECKER_NAME, SUPPLIER_ID, INVOICE_NO, STATUS, DESCRIPTON, CREATE_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATOR, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #if($_databaseId == 'oracle') @{_parameter.id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #end @{_parameter.stockInCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, @{_parameter.bpmKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, @{_parameter.processId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, @{_parameter.warehouseId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, @{_parameter.inType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, @{_parameter.inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, @{_parameter.inPersonId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, @{_parameter.inPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, @{_parameter.checkerId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, @{_parameter.checkerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, @{_parameter.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, @{_parameter.invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, @{_parameter.status,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, @{_parameter.descripton,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, @{_parameter.createId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, @{_parameter.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, @{_parameter.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, @{_parameter.updateId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, @{_parameter.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, @{_parameter.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select:
#set($_p = $_parameter.condition) select t.ID, t.STOCK_IN_CODE, t.BPM_KEY, t.PROCESS_ID, t.WAREHOUSE_ID, t.IN_TYPE, t.IN_TIME, t.IN_PERSON_ID, t.IN_PERSON_NAME, t.CHECKER_ID, t.CHECKER_NAME, t.SUPPLIER_ID, t.INVOICE_NO, t.STATUS, t.DESCRIPTON, t.CREATE_ID, t.CREATOR, t.CREATE_DATE, t.UPDATE_ID, t.UPDATOR, t.UPDATE_DATE, t1.ENUM_TEXT statusName FROM STOCK_IN t left join ENUM_DETAIL t1 on t.STATUS=t1.ENUM_VALUE and t1.TYPE_ID= @{_p.statusDictType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
#where()
#if($_p.id && $_p.id != '') #set($_id = $_p.id) AND ID LIKE @{_id} #end #if($_p.stockInCode && $_p.stockInCode != '') #set($_stockInCode = '%' + $_p.stockInCode + '%') AND STOCK_IN_CODE LIKE @{_stockInCode} #end #if($_p.bpmKey && $_p.bpmKey != '') #set($_bpmKey = '%' + $_p.bpmKey + '%') AND BPM_KEY LIKE @{_bpmKey} #end #if($_p.processId && $_p.processId != '') #set($_processId = $_p.processId) AND PROCESS_ID = @{_processId} #end #if($_p.warehouseId && $_p.warehouseId != '') #set($_warehouseId = $_p.warehouseId) AND WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_warehouseId} #end #if($_p.inType && $_p.inType != '') #set($_inType = $_p.inType) AND IN_TYPE = @{_inType} #end
#if($_p.inTime && $_p.inTime != '') #set($_inTime = $_p.inTime) AND IN_TIME = @{_inTime} #end #if($_p.startInTime && $_p.startInTime != '') #set($_startInTime = $_p.startInTime) AND IN_TIME >= @{_startInTime} #end #if($_p.endInTime && $_p.endInTime != '') #set($_endInTime = $_p.endInTime) AND IN_TIME <= @{_endInTime} #end #if($_p.inPersonId && $_p.inPersonId != '') #set($_inPersonId = $_p.inPersonId) AND IN_PERSON_ID = @{_inPersonId} #end
#if($_p.inPersonName && $_p.inPersonName != '') #set($_inPersonName = '%' + $_p.inPersonName + '%') AND IN_PERSON_NAME LIKE @{_inPersonName} #end #if($_p.checkerId && $_p.checkerId != '') #set($_checkerId = $_p.checkerId) AND CHECKER_ID = @{_checkerId} #end
#if($_p.checkerName && $_p.checkerName != '') #set($_checkerName = '%' + $_p.checkerName + '%') AND CHECKER_NAME LIKE @{_checkerName} #end
#if($_p.supplierId && $_p.supplierId != '') #set($_supplierId = $_p.supplierId) AND SUPPLIER_ID = @{_supplierId} #end
#if($_p.invoiceNo && $_p.invoiceNo != '') #set($_invoiceNo = '%' + $_p.invoiceNo + '%') AND INVOICE_NO LIKE @{_invoiceNo} #end #end
#order($_parameter.condition,"t.ID DESC")

#set($_p = $_parameter.condition) select t.ID, t.STOCK_IN_CODE, t.BPM_KEY, t.PROCESS_ID, t.WAREHOUSE_ID, t.IN_TYPE, t.IN_TIME, t.IN_PERSON_ID, t.IN_PERSON_NAME, t.CHECKER_ID, t.CHECKER_NAME, t.SUPPLIER_ID, t.INVOICE_NO, t.STATUS, t.DESCRIPTON, t.CREATE_ID, t.CREATOR, t.CREATE_DATE, t.UPDATE_ID, t.UPDATOR, t.UPDATE_DATE, t1.ENUM_TEXT statusName
#order($_parameter.condition,"t.ID DESC")
FROM STOCK_IN t left join ENUM_DETAIL t1 on t.STATUS=t1.ENUM_VALUE and t1.TYPE_ID= @{_p.statusDictType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
#where()
#if($_p.id && $_p.id != '') #set($_id = $_p.id) AND ID LIKE @{_id} #end #if($_p.stockInCode && $_p.stockInCode != '') #set($_stockInCode = '%' + $_p.stockInCode + '%') AND STOCK_IN_CODE LIKE @{_stockInCode} #end #if($_p.bpmKey && $_p.bpmKey != '') #set($_bpmKey = '%' + $_p.bpmKey + '%') AND BPM_KEY LIKE @{_bpmKey} #end #if($_p.processId && $_p.processId != '') #set($_processId = $_p.processId) AND PROCESS_ID = @{_processId} #end #if($_p.warehouseId && $_p.warehouseId != '') #set($_warehouseId = $_p.warehouseId) AND WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_warehouseId} #end #if($_p.inType && $_p.inType != '') #set($_inType = $_p.inType) AND IN_TYPE = @{_inType} #end
#if($_p.inTime && $_p.inTime != '') #set($_inTime = $_p.inTime) AND IN_TIME = @{_inTime} #end #if($_p.startInTime && $_p.startInTime != '') #set($_startInTime = $_p.startInTime) AND IN_TIME >= @{_startInTime} #end #if($_p.endInTime && $_p.endInTime != '') #set($_endInTime = $_p.endInTime) AND IN_TIME <= @{_endInTime} #end #if($_p.inPersonId && $_p.inPersonId != '') #set($_inPersonId = $_p.inPersonId) AND IN_PERSON_ID = @{_inPersonId} #end
#if($_p.inPersonName && $_p.inPersonName != '') #set($_inPersonName = '%' + $_p.inPersonName + '%') AND IN_PERSON_NAME LIKE @{_inPersonName} #end #if($_p.checkerId && $_p.checkerId != '') #set($_checkerId = $_p.checkerId) AND CHECKER_ID = @{_checkerId} #end
#if($_p.checkerName && $_p.checkerName != '') #set($_checkerName = '%' + $_p.checkerName + '%') AND CHECKER_NAME LIKE @{_checkerName} #end
#if($_p.supplierId && $_p.supplierId != '') #set($_supplierId = $_p.supplierId) AND SUPPLIER_ID = @{_supplierId} #end
#if($_p.invoiceNo && $_p.invoiceNo != '') #set($_invoiceNo = '%' + $_p.invoiceNo + '%') AND INVOICE_NO LIKE @{_invoiceNo} #end #end

select a.ID, a.STOCK_IN_CODE, a.BPM_KEY, a.PROCESS_ID, a.WAREHOUSE_ID, a.IN_TYPE, a.IN_TIME, a.IN_PERSON_ID, a.IN_PERSON_NAME, a.CHECKER_ID, a.CHECKER_NAME, a.SUPPLIER_ID, a.INVOICE_NO, a.STATUS, a.DESCRIPTON, a.CREATE_ID, a.CREATOR, a.CREATE_DATE, a.UPDATE_ID, a.UPDATOR, a.UPDATE_DATE, b.ID d_ID, b.STOCK_IN_ID d_STOCK_IN_ID, b.SPARE_ID d_SPARE_ID, b.QTY d_QTY, b.PRC d_PRC, b.MONEY d_MONEY, b.REMARK d_REMARK, c.SPARE_CODE d_SPARE_CODE, c.SPARE_NAME d_SPARE_NAME, c.SPEC d_SPEC, c.model d_MODEL, d.FULL_NAME supplierName from STOCK_IN a left join STOCK_IN_DETAIL b on a.ID = b.STOCK_IN_ID LEFT JOIN SPARE c on c.id=b.SPARE_ID LEFT JOIN SUPPLIER d on a.SUPPLIER_ID=d.id WHERE a.ID = @{_parameter, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
